Key Match Events: Julian Álvarez scored the opening goal for Argentina in the 23rd minute
Lionel Messi scored the second goal for Argentina in the 51st minute
Post-Match Reflections: Canada's dream run at the Copa América finally sputtered
Canada were undone by the reigning World Cup champions, Argentina
Canada knew Argentina would have more of the ball but turned it into just one shot on target
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Canada's first ever appearance in the Copa América
Canada went farther than any other Concacaf side in the tournament
Others: Canada will get one more night at this party, in the third place game against either Colombia or Uruguay on Saturday
